snippet.title: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime ISEKAI Chronicles – Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Join Rimuru and friends in a new side scrolling adventure! That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime ISEKAI Chronicles brings the popular series to Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4|5, Xbox Series X|S, and Steam for the first time on August 8, 2024. 

Overcome powerful enemies, build your village, and experience epic moments from the anime plus a new original story supervised by the original author! Learn more: http://spr.ly/6002bqQbQ

Follow Bandai Namco Entertainment: 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bandainamcous
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BandaiNamcoUS
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BandaiNamcoUS
Twitch: http://www.twitch.tv/bandainamcous

#SlimeChronicles #thattimeigotreincarnatedasaslime #tensura
